statements: SELECT * FROM habitat_loss_rate WHERE year > 2010
SELECT region_id, habitat_loss_rate FROM habitat_loss_rate ORDER BY habitat_loss_rate DESC
SELECT year, habitat_area_km2 FROM habitat_loss_rate WHERE region_id = 3
SELECT AVG(habitat_loss_rate) AS avg_loss_rate FROM habitat_loss_rate
SELECT region_id, year, habitat_loss_rate FROM habitat_loss_rate WHERE habitat_loss_rate < 0.5 ORDER BY year ASC
SELECT region_id, habitat_area_km2, year, habitat_loss_rate FROM habitat_loss_rate WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM habitat_loss_rate WHERE year >= 2000 ORDER BY habitat_area_km2 DESC;
SELECT region_id, SUM(habitat_loss_rate) AS total_habitat_loss FROM habitat_loss_rate GROUP BY region_id;
SELECT region_id, AVG(habitat_loss_rate) AS avg_habitat_loss FROM habitat_loss_rate WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020;
SELECT * FROM habitat_loss_rate WHERE habitat_area_km2 < 500 AND habitat_loss_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY year DESC, region_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM habitat_loss;
SELECT region_id, area_lost FROM habitat_loss WHERE time_period = 2021;
SELECT time_period, SUM(area_lost) AS total_area_lost FROM habitat_loss GROUP BY time_period;
SELECT region_id, habitat_loss_rate FROM habitat_loss_rates JOIN habitat_loss ON habitat_loss.region_id = habitat_loss_rates.region_id;
SELECT region_id, area_lost, time_period FROM habitat_loss ORDER BY time_period DESC, area_lost ASC;
SELECT * FROM habitat_loss
SELECT area_lost, population_density FROM habitat_loss WHERE time_period > 5 ORDER BY area_lost DESC
SELECT region_id, area_lost, habitat_loss_rate FROM habitat_loss JOIN habitat_loss_rates ON habitat_loss.region_id = habitat_loss_rates.region_id
SELECT time_period, SUM(area_lost) AS total_area_lost FROM habitat_loss GROUP BY time_period HAVING SUM(area_lost) > 100

SELECT AVG(population_density) AS avg_population_density, MAX(habitat_loss_rate) AS max_habitat_loss_rate FROM habitat_loss JOIN habitat_loss_rates ON habitat_loss.region_id = habitat_loss_rates.region_id WHERE area_lost > 50
SELECT * FROM HabitatLossData ORDER BY region_id ASC, year DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT region_id, habitat_area_km2 FROM HabitatGrowthData WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY habitat_area_km2 DESC;
SELECT region_id, year, loss_rate FROM HabitatLossRate WHERE loss_rate > 0.5 AND year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT year, SUM(habitat_area_km2) AS total_habitat_area FROM HabitatGrowthData GROUP BY year HAVING total_habitat_area > 5000 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT region_id, AVG(loss_rate) AS avg_loss_rate FROM HabitatLossRate GROUP BY region_id HAVING avg_loss_rate < 0.3 ORDER BY region_id;
SELECT region_id, year, habitat_area_km2 FROM HabitatLossData WHERE region_id = 1 AND year > 2010 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM HabitatGrowthData WHERE year = 2021 AND habitat_area_km2 > 500 ORDER BY region_id;
SELECT region_id, year, loss_rate FROM HabitatLossRate WHERE loss_rate < 0.05 ORDER BY region_id, year;
SELECT region_id, SUM(habitat_area_km2) AS total_habitat_area FROM HabitatGrowthData GROUP BY region_id HAVING total_habitat_area > 1000 ORDER BY total_habitat_area DESC;
SELECT region_id, AVG(loss_rate) AS avg_loss_rate FROM HabitatLossRate GROUP BY region_id HAVING avg_loss_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY region_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM habitat_loss;
SELECT region_id, habitat_type, area_km2 FROM habitat_loss WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT region_id, habitat_type, year FROM habitat_loss WHERE area_km2 > 1000 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT hl.region_id, hl.habitat_type, hr.loss_rate FROM habitat_loss hl JOIN habitat_loss_rates hr ON hl.region_id = hr.region_id;
SELECT region_name, country, land_area_km2 FROM region_info;
SELECT * FROM habitat_loss ORDER BY year DESC, region_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT habitat_type, area_km2 FROM habitat_loss_data WHERE year = 2020 AND region_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT region_id, loss_rate FROM habitat_loss_rates WHERE year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2020 ORDER BY loss_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT region_name, country, land_area_km2 FROM region_info WHERE region_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY land_area_km2 ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT h.region_id, h.habitat_type, r.land_area_km2 FROM habitat_loss h JOIN region_info r ON h.region_id = r.region_id WHERE h.area_km2 > 1000 AND r.country = 'Canada';
SELECT * FROM habitat_loss_rates;
SELECT region_name, habitat_area_km2 FROM habitat_loss_rates ORDER BY habitat_area_km2 DESC;
SELECT region_name, deforestation_rate FROM habitat_loss_rates WHERE deforestation_rate < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM deforestation_data WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT region_name, deforestation_percent_change FROM deforestation_trends ORDER BY deforestation_percent_change ASC;
SELECT * FROM habitat_loss_rates;
SELECT region_name, habitat_area_km2 FROM habitat_loss_rates ORDER BY habitat_area_km2 DESC;
SELECT reason_name FROM deforestation_reasons WHERE reason_id = 1;

SELECT d.region_id, r.region_name, d.deforestation_area_km2, t.deforestation_percent_change FROM deforestation_data d JOIN habitat_loss_rates r ON d.region_id = r.region_id JOIN deforestation_trends t ON d.region_id = t.region_id WHERE d.reason_id = 1 AND t.trend_year = 2021;
SELECT * FROM habitat_repopulation WHERE repopulation_rate > 0.5 AND year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020;
